changelog.summary: Expanded metadata, feature toggles, pairing intelligence, integration blueprints
Competitive enhancements – barcode scanning, offline mode, authentication logic, user spirits shelf, pairing sharing
Cigar authentication engine schema initialized with AI scan and code verification logic.
Full stakeholder upgrade – multilingual support, AR overlay, REST API schema, authentication engine completed, biometric journaling, onboarding flow, user flavor journey.
Schema expansion: pairing flavor/body maps, CEU flagging, kiosk UX tags, immersive UI prep
Full enhancement implementation: pairing population, educational expansion, accessibility refinements, SCORM-lite export, kiosk UX upgrades.

metadata.note: Completely redesigned for independent, CEU-viable, tobacconist-free education.

tieredStructure.description: Core fundamentals of cigar anatomy, wrapper origins, and sensory training
Intermediate knowledge in construction dynamics, blend architecture, and draw behavior
Advanced exploration of pairing logic, palate mapping, and flavor memory techniques

lessonFlags.notes: Used to dynamically segment content by learning depth and accreditation status

metadata.readinessExplanation: Percentage of QA criteria passed for release approval

membershipTiers.targetAudience: Casual smokers looking to deepen their cigar knowledge
features: Access to flavor trails and wrapper origin maps

membershipTiers.targetAudience: Enthusiasts seeking full pairing power and personal collection tools
features: Smart Pairing Engine (by wrapper, flavor, strength, etc.)
Save tasting notes and smoking history
Flavor-matching AI to discover similar cigars
5 'Ask the Maestro' comparison requests per month
Full access to Lounge Feed and community threads

membershipTiers.targetAudience: Avid collectors, professionals, and flavor explorers
features: Unlimited Maestro AI Spec Assistant access
Advanced cigar search filters (flavor, body, origin, vitola, region)
Humidor Pro: Unlimited capacity, age tracking, box-date logging
Access to Masterclass Library (blending, terroir, pairing theory)
Entry to exclusive Maestro’s Circle Forum
Priority support and early access to features

membershipTiers.targetAudience: Cigar lounges, retailers, and cigar hospitality businesses
features: Lounge Command Hub: Multi-location humidor dashboard
5 Staff Logins with custom permission levels
Custom printable spec cards, pairing sheets, and locker labels
Event toolkit: RSVP management, ticket generation, tasting menus
Lounge Analytics: cigar trends, pairing behavior, sales data
Verified Lounge Badge with public platform listing
Social Media Promo Generator: branded posts, flyers, QR menus
Private Lounge Network Access (with brands, reps, partner lounges)

projectDirective.purpose: Conduct a complete multidimensional review, evaluation, and structured enhancement of the most recently updated cigarmaestro.json. This review and implementation must reflect the practical, technical, educational, and experiential expectations of a wide range of key stakeholder perspectives, and result in an upgraded, fully integrated project file—while preserving all Eternal Directives, Guiding Principles, and architectural integrity.

UI/UX: Refactor all friction points for mobile, desktop, and lounge kiosk pathways
Apply responsive typography and layout integrity
Ensure touch-optimized logic for POS systems and lounge tablets
Cigar History Integration: Expand brand archive logic with cross-references, legacy depth, and time-stamped metadata
Refine storytelling blocks for both classroom viability and Instagram shareability
Enable timeline export, legacy map views, and clickable tags for founder and brand eras
Cigar Knowledge & Educational Depth: Enhance module scaffolding and quiz logic
Add 'Did You Know?' blurbs, microlearning tips, and tasting note insights
Include sensory training cues, vitola diagrams, and construction visualizations
Link to flavor wheel engine + shareable lexicon glossary
Academic & Accreditation Readiness: Add instructor notes, grading rubrics, quiz explanations, and progress tracking
Flag lessons for accreditation tiers (Introductory, Professional, Expert)
System Weaknesses & Fixes: Correct all schema flaws, broken prompt paths, and metadata inconsistencies
Patch deprecated modules, outdated UX zones, and inaccurate flavor mappings
Reclassify vague language using certified tobacconist phrasing
Revalidate JSON hierarchy, ensure stable version control and modular traceability

finalDeliverables: A 1–10 scorecard for each of the five pillars
A prioritized action plan by discipline: Development, Design, Content, UX
An optimized output for cigarmaestro.json with structural and content enhancements
goal: Profoundly useful to both artisan and enthusiast alike

highPriority: Refactor outdated or ambiguous keys in cigar spec modules using certified tobacconist phrasing.
Normalize nested modules for clearer GPT parsing.
Implement fallback chains and response triggers in schema for GPT-based conversations.
Ensure full SCORM-lite metadata encoding for LMS output compatibility.
mediumPriority: Modularize kiosk logic and POS pathways for scalability across retail environments.
Enforce strict camelCase convention across all keys.

highPriority: Apply WCAG and ADA compliance layers to all UI modules.
Polish interactive elements like dark mode toggles, contrast scaling, and touch zones.
mediumPriority: Inject typographic hierarchy into story exports and pairing displays.
Refine kiosk layouts for brand-forward storytelling: include founder quotes, featured blends.

highPriority: Expand CEU-aligned learning content with instructor notes, rubric logic, and quiz explanation fields.
Enhance glossary and flavor wheel links with shareable anchors and visual aids.
Insert 'Did You Know?' facts, sensory cues, and vitola diagrams directly into educational paths.
mediumPriority: Update brand legacy maps and founder bio cards with Instagram-friendly assets.
Localize key terms for multilingual preview support.

highPriority: Refactor onboarding flows for first-time users across all roles.
Ensure kiosk modules are optimized for tap-only environments and offline caching.
mediumPriority: Enable timeline exploration and brand history via intuitive sliders and tag-based filters.
Gamify educational progress with badges for tasting milestones and quiz completions.
